channel.title: 6 Questions - Please help
channel.description:
Hello again, i have a few questions, if you could tell me the awnser or throw a link at me for the tutorial that would be great.
1) How would i make the interface for a rsps tool and which program would i use to make this rsps tool work? 2)How do you make that partical effect or whatever like in runescape for the comp. cape? 3)Is there any tutorials for a working G.E? 4)How would you make a custom shop? 5)How would you add rewards from killing someone in the wild? 6)Is it possiable to make a custom empty space for a monster? Like when you step in the portal to go fight bork, you go to a big area with only bork? Something like that.
Thank you for all your help!:)

item.title: 6 Questions - Please help
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

All of your questions can be solved with a little brainwork (the programming) and a lot of investigation in your source.

Read full topic

item.title: 6 Questions - Please help
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

[quote=“nickog15, post:3, topic:443259”]1) Can you link me to the right download? There are mutiple VB6 and i dont know which one to choose.
2) I mean that white stuff at the bottem at the cape that moves? I heard people call it particals so thats what i called it, i don’t know the right term.
3)Can you link me to a tutorial?

Thanks;)[/quote]

1.) There is no “right” download it depends on the version you’re capable and comfortable with using.
2.) Oh, particles. That’s a new system Jagex uses so that they no longer have to rely on bulky polygon techniques. I have no idea how you would go about actually recreating said effect, if even possible, on a rsps. I have no expertise in this area what-so-ever.
3.) Just use the search board feature in the tutorials section.

Read full topic

item.title: 6 Questions - Please help
item.dc:creator: @nickog15 nickog15
item.description:
@nickog15 wrote:

  1. Can you link me to the right download? There are mutiple VB6 and i dont know which one to choose.
  2. I mean that white stuff at the bottem at the cape that moves? I heard people call it particals so thats what i called it, i don’t know the right term.
    3)Can you link me to a tutorial?

Thanks;)

Read full topic

item.title: 6 Questions - Please help
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

1.) I’m assuming you mean how to make a GUI, VB works great.
2.) I’m not quite sure I understand this, so I won’t answer.
3.) Yes.
4.) Open your shop handler class, find out how shops are handled (usually a cfg file in ./data/), create the shop by adding items/amounts, add that shop to open upon first/second click of an NPC.
5.) Check if the user is in the wilderness (there should be a boolean depending on your base that already does this), add that to the “applyDead” method (from PI, I think) and then have a random item from an array chosen and given.
6.) Yes, just add a monster to an empty area. If you mean making custom map data for that specific purpose make use of peterbjornx’s work.

Read full topic
